monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2015-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 16.1°C and salinity of 35.9. Deep water measurements extend to 2011m depth.
2015-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 13.9°C and salinity of 34.4. Deep water measurements extend to 2028m depth.
2015-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 12.6°C and salinity of 34.9. Deep water measurements extend to 2005m depth.
2015-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 9.1°C and salinity of 34.8. Deep water measurements extend to 3859m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
